name: Zhen-Xiang Chen
content: ï»¿ lociç½ç»å®éªå®¤ éè´ç¿åå£«Zhenxiang Chen,Ph.D. Provincial Key Laboratory for Network based Intelligent Computing School of Information Science and Engineering, University of Jinan Mobile:(+86) 186-7881-7522 Email: czx@ujn.edu.cn(æçè¯·èç³»ä¸æ¹é®ä»¶) Lab-Latest: LOCI - The Lab of Cyber Intelligence Lab-Old: LOCI - The Lab of Cyber Intelligence æçèç³»(Emailä¼å ): (+86) 156-1051-6170(Dr. Wang) /zxchen@ujn.edu.cn ä¸ªäººç®ä»--Biography Chen Zhenxiang, doctor of engineering, Professor of Jinan University, doctoral tutor, Dean of School of information science and engineering of Jinan University, national first-class professional principal of network engineering, excellent Postgraduate Tutor of Shandong Province, leader of youth entrepreneurship and technology team of colleges and universities in Shandong Province, and leader of independent innovation team of colleges and universities in Jinan. Currently, he is the director of Shandong health big data industry innovation center, the executive deputy director of the cultivation base (Computer Science) of Shandong basic science research center, the director of China Computer Society (CCF), the vice president of Shandong computer society, the president of International Computer Society (ACM) and the vice president of CCF Jinan Branch. The person in charge of Shandong excellent graduate student case base of fundamentals of computer engineering, the person in charge of Shandong high-quality postgraduate course of advanced computer network, the person in charge of Shandong Provincial ideological and political demonstration course of advanced computer network, and the person in charge of Shandong first-class course of principles of computer network won 3 first prizes and 2 second prizes of Shandong provincial teaching achievements. He is mainly engaged in research in computer networks, network security, intelligent information processing and other fields, and presided over more than 10 provincial and ministerial projects such as 2 projects of the National Natural Science Foundation of China and the key research and development plan of Shandong Province. He has published more than 130 papers in famous journals and conferences at home and abroad, including more than 30 academic papers in representative journals and academic conferences in the fields of IEEE TIFS, TKDE, infcom, iwqos, etc., won 2 second prizes and 1 third prize of Shandong provincial scientific and technological progress award, authorized more than 20 invention patents, transferred 12 invention patents, and some research achievements have been commercialized.
